nodes.text: The Mos Eisley prefect's office, also known as the spaceport prefect's office, was a law enforcement agency office built on Straight Street in the spaceport of Mos Eisley on the planet Tatooine. In 7958 C.R.C., Sedra Hoxin served as a police constable for the office and sent an annual Life Day greeting card to Inspector Tanivos Divo of the Coruscant Security Force with an update regarding Boba Fett, leader of the Krayt's Claw bounty hunter gang, who were based out of Mos Eisley. In 0 BBY, two Imperial stormtroopers stood guard outside the building.

The Mos Eisley prefect's office first appeared in the 1977 original trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. It was first identified as the spaceport prefect's office in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations, with further identification as the Mos Eisley prefect's office in the 2018 reference book Star Wars: Scum and Villainy: Case Files on the Galaxy's Most Notorious, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo. The name originated in the 2004 Star Wars Legends reference book Inside the Worlds of Star Wars Trilogy, which was written by James Luceno.
